pages.text: Dropped by killing bear-type creatures.$(br)Grants the consumer Rage I (2 min), Nourishment I (5 min), Poison I (20s), and Nausea I (10s).

"The thick, oily end part of a large wild animal's forelimb."$(br)"Although it looks filling, that's no reason to eat it raw. The saliva or whatever between the claws is enough to knock someone out from the smell."$(br)"Only after proper processing does it become a delicacy."
